Question: What is their vacation policy?
Answer:
7.7 Vacation

Employees are eligible for vacation time based on their length of service with the Company. Vacation time is accrued on a pro-rata basis each pay period. Employees must request vacation time in advance and receive approval from their supervisor. The Company reserves the right to deny vacation requests based on business needs. Unused vacation time may be carried over into the next year, up to a maximum limit specified by the Company. Upon termination of employment, employees will be paid for any unused vacation time in

Answer: Yes, there is a Drug and Alcohol policy mentioned in the Zania, Inc. Employee Handbook under the section "Safety and Loss Prevention." This policy is outlined in section 8.1 of the handbook.
